creator: kelly
descriptionHtml:
[ How to play ]
- Connect all the circles using the starting point of the shining bolt.
- Place the appropriate bolts on each bulb and the light will connect.
- The stage is cleared when all the circles are connected with light.

[ Game Features ]
- This game is a good brain-healing game for relaxing time.
- Offline available, not pressed for time. Great for a short break.
- The rules are simple enough for both children and adults to enjoy together.
- More than 1,000 stage modes are available.
- There is no limit to the number of rotations of the circle.
- The higher the stage, the more bolts and light bulbs placed, making it more difficult.
- If you get stuck in any level, you can take advantage of hints.

Can you solve all the stages?
Here's an easy way to train your brain with a relaxed mind.

Don't stop trying!
descriptionShort: Lights connect puzzle - Rotate the circle and light up all the circles.

appDetails.developerAddress: 306, 101, 15 Purunmaeul-ro, Deogyang-gu, Goyang-si, Gyeonggi-do, Republic of Korea

Please enjoy a variety of newly prepared content!

title: All Lights Connect : Puzzle

container.value: 306, 101, 15 Purunmaeul-ro, Deogyang-gu, Goyang-si, Gyeonggi-do, Republic of Korea

creator: kelly
descriptionHtml:
[ How to play ]
- Connect all the circles using the starting point of the shining bolt.
- Place the appropriate bolts on each bulb and the light will connect.
- The stage is cleared when all the circles are connected with light.

[ Game Features ]
- What color will it become when light and light meet?
- Solve the puzzle by guessing the color of the hint of the light.
- This game is a good brain-healing game for relaxing time.
- Offline available, not pressed for time. Great for a short break.
- The rules are simple enough for both children and adults to enjoy together.
- More than 1,000 stage modes are available.
- There is no limit to the number of rotations of the circle.
- The higher the stage, the more bolts and light bulbs placed, making it more difficult.
- If you get stuck in any level, you can take advantage of hints.

[Collect achievement badges]
- Badges are awarded when certain achievements have been achieved more than a certain number of times.
- Complete various tasks and collect all the unique badges.

[Challenge Mode Open]
- This is a new mode that survives to the end without a game over.
- If you exceed the number of turns, it's game over.
- Do not miss the tension, survive to the end and challenge the best record.

Can you solve all the stages?
Here's an easy way to train your brain with a relaxed mind.

Don't stop trying!
